Package io.github.eutro.jwasm

Interface ByteOutputStream<E extends java.lang.Exception>

Type Parameters:
E - The exception that may be thrown by writes.
All Known Implementing Classes:
ByteOutputStream.BaosByteOutputStream, ByteOutputStream.Dummy
public interface ByteOutputStream<E extends java.lang.Exception>
An interface for writing WebAssembly bytecode, with methods for writing common WebAssembly types, such as LEB128 encoded numbers.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  ByteOutputStream.BaosByteOutputStream
    A ByteOutputStream that writes to a ByteArrayOutputStream.
    static class  ByteOutputStream.Dummy
    A dummy ByteOutputStream that ignores writes.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static ByteOutputStream<java.lang.RuntimeException> DUMMY
    A dummy ByteOutputStream whose writes do nothing.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void put​(byte b)
    Write a byte to the stream.
    default void put​(byte[] bytes)
    Write all the bytes from an array to the stream.
    default void putByteArray​(byte[] bytes)
    Write an array of bytes to the stream, writing its length first as an unsigned integer, followed by the raw bytes.
    default void putFloat32​(float f)
    Write a 32 bit floating point value to the stream, in little endian byte order.
    default void putFloat64​(double f)
    Write a 64 bit floating point value to the stream, in little endian byte order.
    default void putLimit​(int min, java.lang.Integer max)
    Write a WebAssembly limit to the stream, consisting of a minimum and an optional maximum.
    default void putName​(java.lang.String name)
    Write a string as a WebAssembly name: a vector of UTF-8 bytes.
    default void putUInt32​(int v)
    Write an unsigned 32 bit integer to the stream, in little endian byte order.
    default int putVarSInt​(long i)
    Write a signed LEB128 encoded integer to the stream.
    default int putVarUInt​(long i)
    Write an unsigned LEB128 encoded integer to the stream.

  • Field Details

    • DUMMY

      static final ByteOutputStream<java.lang.RuntimeException> DUMMY
      A dummy ByteOutputStream whose writes do nothing. Can be used to predict how many bytes a given write will take.

  • Method Details

    • put

      void put​(byte b) throws E extends java.lang.Exception
      Write a byte to the stream.
      Parameters:
      b - The byte to write.
      Throws:
      E - If a write error occurs.

    • put

      default void put​(byte[] bytes) throws E extends java.lang.Exception
      Write all the bytes from an array to the stream.
      Parameters:
      bytes - The bytes to write.
      Throws:
      E - If a write error occurs.

    • putUInt32

      default void putUInt32​(int v) throws E extends java.lang.Exception
      Write an unsigned 32 bit integer to the stream, in little endian byte order.
      Parameters:
      v - The integer to write.
      Throws:
      E - If a write error occurs.

    • putFloat32

      default void putFloat32​(float f) throws E extends java.lang.Exception
      Write a 32 bit floating point value to the stream, in little endian byte order.
      Parameters:
      f - The value to write.
      Throws:
      E - If a write error occurs.

    • putFloat64

      default void putFloat64​(double f) throws E extends java.lang.Exception
      Write a 64 bit floating point value to the stream, in little endian byte order.
      Parameters:
      f - The value to write.
      Throws:
      E - If a write error occurs.

    • putVarUInt

      default int putVarUInt​(long i) throws E extends java.lang.Exception
      Write an unsigned LEB128 encoded integer to the stream.
      Parameters:
      i - The integer to write.
      Returns:
      The number of bytes written.
      Throws:
      E - If a write error occurs.

    • putVarSInt

      default int putVarSInt​(long i) throws E extends java.lang.Exception
      Write a signed LEB128 encoded integer to the stream.
      Parameters:
      i - The integer to write.
      Returns:
      The number of bytes written.
      Throws:
      E - If a write error occurs.

    • putByteArray

      default void putByteArray​(byte[] bytes) throws E extends java.lang.Exception
      Write an array of bytes to the stream, writing its length first as an unsigned integer, followed by the raw bytes.
      Parameters:
      bytes - The byte array to write.
      Throws:
      E - If a write error occurs.

    • putLimit

      default void putLimit​(int min, java.lang.Integer max) throws E extends java.lang.Exception
      Write a WebAssembly limit to the stream, consisting of a minimum and an optional maximum.
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum.
      max - The maximum, or null if there is none.
      Throws:
      E - If a write error occurs.

    • putName

      default void putName​(java.lang.String name) throws E extends java.lang.Exception
      Write a string as a WebAssembly name: a vector of UTF-8 bytes.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to write.
      Throws:
      E - If a write error occurs.
